description: Hon. K. Sripavan, C.J. - Paudgalika Tha Kamhal Himiyan...
parties: Paudgalika Tha Kamhal Himiyange Sangamaya also known as The Private Tea Factory Owners Association now known as The Sri Lanka Tea Factory Owners Association. Pankandurage Jemis, No. 117, Bolawana North, Gilimale, Ratnapura. 3.
